attributes.action: Vote against the decision that declared that animals don’t feel emotion and pain
attributes.additional_details:
We must act now in order to stop this senseless decision.

To deny animals sentient status is to leave them vulnerable to exploitation.
attributes.background:
On November 20th 2017 MP’s rejected the inclusion of animal sentience - which is the fact that animals feel emotion and pain - into the EU Withdrawal Bill.

This throws all Animal rights and welfare into jeopardy as soon as we are officially scheduled to leave the EU on March 29th 2019.
